list.name: expelliarmus
list.desc: Library for decoding data generated by event cameras to NumPy arrays. Created together with [Gregor Lenz](https://lenzgregor.com).

list.name: Tonic
list.desc: Datasets and transformations for event-based data. Created by [Gregor Lenz](https://lenzgregor.com).

list.name: Open Neuromorphic
list.desc: Organisation for the open source neuromorphic research. Founded together with [Gregor Lenz](https://lenzgregor.com), [Jason Eshraghian](https://jasoneshraghian.com) and [Charlotte Frenkel](https://chfrenkel.github.io).
